title: Israeli forces intercept several Gaza flotilla boats
subhead: Unable to stop all of the nearly 45 boats heading toward the Palestinian enclave, Israel boarded about 20 of them. The Global Sumud Flotilla, seeking to 'break the blockade' of Gaza, claimed a symbolic victory.

title: Five fun ways to discover Paris and its surroundings with your family
subhead: See the Eiffel Tower from a hot air balloon, take a bus that plunges into the Seine, or ride down the Champs-Elysées in a tuk-tuk: The metro is far from the only way to explore the capital and its surroundings.

title: Massad Boulos, Trump's senior adviser for Africa: 'Our policy is based on peace, partnerships and prosperity'

title: Trump's Gaza plan wins Arab backing, despite frustrations over Israel's influence
subhead: The US president ignored suggestions from Muslim countries, which regret the lack of a clear timetable for Israel's withdrawal from the Gaza Strip.

title: Svalbard, the fastest-warming place on Earth
subhead: 'Our planet at +1.5°C' (1/6). The Norwegian archipelago has warmed by 4°C over the past 30 years. Landslides and thawing permafrost threaten the population, whose way of life is highly greenhouse gas-intensive.
